translations: [劳经][生态]生产者，制造者( producer的名词复数 )；制片人

phrs.translation: 发生炉煤气；生产天然气
煤气发生炉；煤气发生器
音乐节目监制；音乐创作
生产资料，生产者耐用设备

sentences.sentence: Superwoman exists only in the minds of journalists and Hollywood producers.
sentences.translation: 超级女人只存在于记者和好莱坞制片人的脑子里。

sentences.sentence: Television producers seem irresponsibly insouciant about churning out violence.
sentences.translation: 电视制片人似乎对大量制作暴力节目抱着不负责任的无所谓的态度。

sentences.sentence: Fairview Estate is one of the oldest and the most go-ahead wine producers in South Africa.
sentences.translation: “丽景庄园”是南非最古老、最有开拓进取精神的葡萄酒生产商之一。
